review: I highly recommend this game, soundtracks and artwork are overwhelmingly beautiful, story is very immersive yet somewhat mysterious, wanting you to find out the truth.Beautiful and enjoyable, i can't even explain with words, so go play it yourself! XDPS, Don't cry at the end......
Totally recommend this game, experience its by the following steps,Step 1: Find 4 friendsStep 2: Join togetherStep 3:KICKASS AND CHEWBUBBLEGUM!!!!!
